description: CSS file defining styles and theme variables for the interactive Tic Tac Toe application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container style with centered text and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application with background color and layout management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with animation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for application links with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button with hover and active states.
